settings.heading: On the scene in 5G
settings.subheading:
A fast and reliable processor powers a virtually lag-free 5G** experience.

*Requires optimal 5G netwrok connection, available in select markets. Check with your carrier for availability and details.

*5G speeds vary and require optimal network and connection (factors inclde frequency, bandwidth, congestion); see carrier for availability.

settings.heading: We're serious about security
settings.subheading:
Galaxy A Series helps protect your data with multilayered security and the ability to privately share* your files on your terms.

*Private Share features for both the sender and receiver requires Galaxy mobile devices with Android 9 or later and the Private Share app.

settings.heading: Focus more with One UI Core
settings.subheading: One UI Core helps you focus on what matters to you. Hardware and software work together, with content and features at your fingers so you can get to them faster. Seamlessly swicth apps and get information for multiple apps at once - the conveninet UI design let's you multitask on a single screen.

settings.heading: An awesome Android experience, always
settings.subheading:
Get the lateste Google apps* on Android OS, fully supported on your Galaxy A1 5G.

*Goolge, Android, Goolge play, Youtube and other marks are trademarks of Google LLC.

settings.heading: Modern style. Practical function.
settings.subheading:
A functional, durable design with a silky smooth finish makes Galaxy A13 5G* a simplistic delight.

*Requires optimal 5G network connection, available in select markets. Check with your carrier for availability and details

settings.heading: A battery that gives your charger a break*
settings.subheading:
Whatever your day has in store, a long-lasting, fast-chargind* battery makes sure your're ready for it.

*Wall charger sold separtaely; use only Samsung-approved chargers and cables. to avoid injury or damage to your device, do not use incompatible, worn or damaged batteries, chargers or cables. Supports up to 15W Fast Charging.

settings.heading: Unlock your phone with your fingerprint
settings.subheading:
With the fingerprint sensor built into the power button, one seamless motion gets you into your phone.

*The availability of this feature may vary by country or carrier.

settings.title: Triple-lens camera. Countless possibilities.
settings.text:
With a high-res triple-lens camera system, Galaxy A13 5G* gives you one of your sought-after cameras at a fraction of the price.

*Requires optimal 5G network connection, available in select markets. Check with your carrier for availability and details. Download and streaming speeds may vary based on content provider, server connection and other factors.
